Hello all,: I want to install kile for LDAP on ubuntu. I download kile 2.0 to my home directory.  tar jxf kile-2.0b1.tar.bz2  then cd kile-2.0b1  then I configured it   ./configure --prefix=$HOME/kile-bin
there is normally a text document called README or INSTALL in the tar file, they have instructions
